summary: Adds a couple of dragon themed weapons to skyrim
descriptionHtml:
[URL=http://www.directupload.net][IMG]http://s7.directupload.net/images/140326/aiz6vb5h.png[/IMG][/URL]

[size=16][color=red]Description[/color][/size]
Adds Dragon Weapon Set to the game.
It contains:
Dagger
Sword
Greatsword
Axe
Battleaxe
Mace
Warhammer

As requestet it not just includes my first mod and the other Dragon themed Weapons but also my Scorpion themed Dagger and Sword.
All the meshes are made from scratch, the textures are cut out from pictures I took.

[size=16][color=red]Requirements[/color][/size]

No other mods required. Maybe an updated game.

[size=16][color=red]Location[/color][/size]

All the weapons can be crafted at any forge under daedric section.
The scorpion themed weapons can be crafted under elven section.
The Curse of Sithis can be found while doing the Quest Hail Sithis!

[size=16][color=red]install[/color][/size]

Just extract the archive to your Skyrim/Data folder or use the Nexus Mod Manager

[size=16][color=red]uninstall[/color][/size]

Deactivate via Mod Manager
or
delete the folder Eisregen in Textures/weapons and meshes/weapons and the DragonWeapons.esp in your data folder

[size=16][color=red]Credits[/color][/size]

Thanks to Bethesda for the game and the Creation Kit.
Thanks to the person who crafted the real weapons I took the pictures from.
Thanks to jakeoberg for taking some ingame pictures of my weapons so i could use them here.


Tools Used
===========
FO3 Archive Utility
Blender
NIFSkope
Gimp
Creation Kit

[size=16][color=red]ChangeLog[/color][/size]

1.0 release

1.1 tryed to optimize the textures. For me it works very well and its not that much of qualityloss
author: EisregenX90
